The controller is primarily intended to be interacted with via a token frontend.","events":{"Frontend(address,address)":{"details":"Emitted when updating the frontend.","params":{"current":"Address of the new frontend.","old":"Address of the old frontend."}},"Storage(address,address)":{"details":"Emitted when updating the storage.","params":{"current":"Address of the new storage.","old":"Address of the old storage."}}},"kind":"dev","methods":{"allowance(address,address)":{"details":"Returns the allowance for a spender","params":{"owner":"The address of the owner of the tokens.","spender":"The address of the spender."},"returns":{"_0":"Number of tokens the spender is allowed to spend."}},"approve_withCaller(address,address,uint256)":{"details":"Approves a spender [ERC20]. If the recipient is a non-contract address this method behaves just like transfer.","params":{"amount":"Number of tokens to transfer.","caller":"Address of the caller passed through the frontend.","data":"Additional data passed to the recipient's tokenFallback method.","to":"Recipient address."}},"transferFrom_withCaller(address,address,address,uint256)":{"details":"Transfers tokens from a specific address [ERC20]. The address owner has to approve the spender beforehand.","params":{"amount":"Number of tokens to transfer.","caller":"Address of the caller passed through the frontend.","from":"Address to debet the tokens from.","to":"Recipient address."}},"transferOwnership(address)":{"details":"Allows the current owner to set the pendingOwner address.","params":{"newOwner":"The address to transfer ownership to."}},"transferStorageOwnership(address)":{"details":"Transfers the ownership of the storage.","params":{"newOwner":"Address of the new storage owner."}},"transfer_withCaller(address,address,uint256)":{"details":"Transfers tokens [ERC20].","params":{"amount":"Number of tokens to transfer.","caller":"Address of the caller passed through the frontend.","to":"Recipient address."}},"unpause()":{"details":"Unpause the function protected by Pausable modifier."}},"title":"StandardController","version":1},"userdoc":{"kind":"user","methods":{"renounceOwnership()":{"notice":"Renouncing to ownership will leave the contract without an owner.  @param to The address of the intended recipient.

@dev Prevents tokens to be sent to well known blackholes by throwing on known blackholes.
 @param to The address of the intended recipient.

@dev Returns the current frontend.
 @return Address of the frontend.

@dev Returns the current storage.
 @return Address of the storage.

@dev Sets a new frontend.
 @param frontend_ Address of the new frontend.

@dev Sets a new storage.
 @param storage_ Address of the new storage.

 @param newOwner Address of the new storage owner.

devdoc.details: This is the base contract which delegates token methods [ERC20 and ERC677] to their respective library implementations. The controller is primarily intended to be interacted with via a token frontend.

allowance(address,address).details: Returns the allowance for a spender

params.owner: The address of the owner of the tokens.

returns._0: Number of tokens the spender is allowed to spend.

approve_withCaller(address,address,uint2.details: Approves a spender [ERC20]. Note that using the approve/transferFrom presents a possible security vulnerability described in: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1YLPtQxZu1UAvO9cZ1O2RPXBbT0mooh4DYKjA_jp-RLM/edit#heading=h.quou09mcbpzw Use transferAndCall to mitigate.

params.caller: Address of the caller passed through the frontend.
params.spender: The address of the future spender.

balanceOf(address).details: Returns the number tokens associated with an address.

claimOwnership().details: Allows the pendingOwner address to finalize the transfer.

claimStorageOwnership().details: Claims the ownership of the storage.

params.initialSupply: The amount of tokens to mint upon creation.
params.storage_: Address of the token storage for the controller.

pause().details: Pause the function protected by Pausable modifier.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

renounceOwnership().details: Allows the current owner to relinquish control of the contract.

transferAndCall_withCaller(address,addre.details: Transfers tokens and subsequently calls a method on the recipient [ERC677]. If the recipient is a non-contract address this method behaves just like transfer.

params.caller: Address of the caller passed through the frontend.
params.data: Additional data passed to the recipient's tokenFallback method.

transferFrom_withCaller(address,address,.details: Transfers tokens from a specific address [ERC20]. The address owner has to approve the spender beforehand.

params.caller: Address of the caller passed through the frontend.
params.from: Address to debet the tokens from.

transferOwnership(address).details: Allows the current owner to set the pendingOwner address.

params.newOwner: The address to transfer ownership to.

transferStorageOwnership(address).details: Transfers the ownership of the storage.

params.newOwner: Address of the new storage owner.

params.caller: Address of the caller passed through the frontend.

unpause().details: Unpause the function protected by Pausable modifier.

devdoc.title: StandardController

renounceOwnership().notice: Renouncing to ownership will leave the contract without an owner. It will not be possible to call the functions with the `onlyOwner` modifier anymore.
